name: hammer-arm
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers user’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
